post.author: 황성규
post.content:
We'll meet at 8PM tonight. Location: Tim Hortons at Hwy 401 & Hurontario.
Let's have a chat over a beer (or snack). Of cource, Tim Horton or Wendy's dosen't serve beer. So we're probably moving to somewhere in Mississauga. For those who want to join later, feel free to call my cell phone at 416-805-7973
Participiants: --------------------- Spencer Hwang Min Kim Jame Suh Thomas Lee 홍영기 Travis Choi(최덕선) 한종희 황선용
---------------------
(password 1)
post.title: Tonight! 8PM Tim Hortons at 401&10
